FeedMessage.title: Ukraine, Bulgaria agree on language provisions of education law
FeedMessage.description: The agreement also provides for ensuring the right of representatives of Bulgarian national minority to study in and learn their native language.

FeedMessage.title: Senate confirms Mike Pompeo as Trump's second secretary of state
FeedMessage.description: Pompeo is now expected to travel to Brussels for the NATO Foreign Ministerial meeting on Friday.

FeedMessage.title: Bill Cosby found guilty in sexual assault retrial
FeedMessage.description: A jury convicted Cosby of three counts of aggravated indecent assault less than a year after another jury deadlocked on the charges.
